item.title: Trump to speak with Putin after U.S. pauses some weapons shipments to Ukraine
item.description: The Trump-Putin call comes after the U.S. said it would halt some weapons shipments to Ukraine, which continues to fight off invading Russian forces.

item.title: House vote on Big, Beautiful Bill moves ahead after Republican defectors flip
item.description: The late-night vote to begin final debate marked a win for Republican leadership seeking to deliver on Trump's second term policy agenda.

item.title: Trump's megabill is in real trouble, as House GOP defectors vote 'no' on advancing it
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson can lose just three members' votes and still pass the bill in a party-line vote. But more than a dozen Republicans are currently ...

item.title: Trump says U.S. struck trade deal with Vietnam that imposes 20% tariff on its imports
item.description: Vietnam, whose exports to the U.S. reportedly comprised 30% of its gross domestic product last year, is especially vulnerable to Trump's tariffs.

item.title: Senate sets record for longest vote-a-rama as Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' teeters
item.description: Senators worked through the night on amendments to President Donald Trump's "big, beautiful" spending bill. A final vote could come Tuesday.
